title: Ultra-thin bezel and ‘smart frame’ rumored for Surface Pro 4
text:
Ultra-thin bezel and ‘smart frame’ rumored for Surface Pro 4 
Published By: DigitalTrends.com - Today 
As Windows devotees wait patiently for new details on the Surface Pro 4, rumour has it that the device will feature an ultra-thin bezel and ...
